body: Hi, I found the reason for my issue but will leave this post up in case others have similar issues. If the "runRad" is set to false while the "writeRad" is still set to true, the .res and .ill files are deleted.   I see several solutions:   [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/E6-J*b1OZQNtYaHRQcSoYmyUyHr5tgJj2H*x*DSN7KSQo06x1059GNM2EpSssRJXzusFpxI9vmAa9WjXWkZublGPhNJHbP2t/resfilesdisappear3.jpg)     [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/E6-J*b1OZQO11dkx4AYdbDZylrINRmFYhOXJxbBf5PaVPUOfjpgN2-lcCcxhGFn4BR-KarGtuGqSiFJe1owC0Vtb2fnfNZR6/resfilesdisappear4.jpg)   Good luck everybody.
